title: Solve The Quadratic Inequality
body: Solve the following inequality graphically: That is, graph the inequality and write where the inequality is true using interval notation. Write the answer in the form of (x1, x2) where () exclude a number and [] include a number. In the case of $$infinities$$, write it as $$\infty$$ and if there are multiple ranges, use & to include it as well..
